original: 京兆杜陵人，曹魏官員，韋康、韋誕之父。東漢末年，馬騰、韓遂交惡，互相攻伐多年，曹操遣鍾繇、韋端斡旋，令兩人和解。
text: Jingzhao Duling, Cao Wei official, father of Wei Kang and Wei Dan. At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, Ma Teng and Han Sui fought against each other for many years. Cao Cao sent Zhong Yao and Wei Duan to mediate and reconcile the two.
